heading.description: Proudly founded by doctors who put your health first, we combine medical expertise with personalized care to ensure a safe, comfortable, and high-quality recovery experience.

parejas.label: Just 10 minutes from the border
parejas.description: Located only minutes from the U.S. border with easily accessible from the airport, with medical fast-pass options for a smooth, worry-free crossing.

negocios.label: No minimum stay required
negocios.description: No fixed packages or minimum nights. Your recovery plan is tailored to your body, your procedure, and your personal healing pace.

urbano.label: Flexible payment options & insurance support

items.question: What types of recovery do you specialize in?
items.answer: We specialize in post-surgical recovery, chronic illness management, and rehabilitation services.

items.question: How long is the typical stay?
items.answer: Stay duration varies based on individual needs, typically ranging from 2 weeks to 3 months.

items.question: Do you accept insurance?
items.answer: We work with most major insurance providers and offer flexible payment options.

items.question: Can family members visit?
items.answer: Yes, we have designated visiting hours and family support programs.

uniqueHotels.title: At Palmas Recovery
uniqueHotels.description: Enjoy a stress-free recovery in a space created to support healing, privacy, and total comfort:
bullets: + Private and shared suites with adjustable beds, A/C, and high-speed Wi-Fi
+ Private transportation to the hospital and post-op appointments
+ Spacious, serene common areas with wide hallways and full in-room privacy
+ Fresh laundry service included during your stay
+ On-site boutique with post-surgical garments and recovery supplements
+ Chef-prepared anti-inflammatory meals: 3 nourishing meals + 2 snacks daily
+ Complimentary hydration station with wellness drinks and healing teas

services.sectionSubtitle: Every aspect of your recovery is carefully managed by our dedicated team of healthcare professionals.

core.title: 24/7 Medical Supervision

core.title: Medication Management

services.commitmentSubtitle: Driven by purpose, guided by compassion, dedicated to your recovery.
services.missionText: Provide the best post-surgical recovery service in a timely, efficient, and warm manner, ensuring a healthy return to your daily life with the highest standards of medical care and personal attention.
services.visionText: To be Tijuana's most trusted post-surgical recovery spa, recognized internationally for excellence in service, state-of-the-art facilities, and compassionate care that transforms the recovery experience.
services.ctaSubtitle: Experience the difference that professional care and luxury comfort make in your post-surgical journey.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email, phone number, booking details, and special requests. We may also collect basic usage data to improve site performance.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Information
list: Process bookings and provide requested services.
Respond to inquiries and customer support requests.
Improve our services, website, and user experience.
Send operational communications related to your stay.

sections.title: 3. Cookies and Analytics
sections.content: We may use cookies and similar technologies to measure usage and improve our website. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

sections.title: 4. Sharing of Information
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with trusted service providers who help operate our website or deliver services, subject to confidentiality obligations.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We use reasonable administrative and technical safeguards to protect your information. No system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
sections.content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us. We will respond in accordance with applicable law.

sections.title: 7. Contact Us
sections.content: For privacy-related questions, contact us at palmasrecoveryspa@gmail.com.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please review these terms carefully before using our services.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the site.

sections.title: 2. Booking and Payments
list: Reservations are subject to availability and confirmation.
A deposit may be required to secure your booking.
Prices are subject to change without notice.

sections.title: 3. Cancellations
sections.content: Cancellation policies may vary by room type and season. Please review your confirmation details for applicable terms.

sections.title: 4. Use of the Website
sections.content: You agree not to misuse the website, interfere with its functionality, or attempt unauthorized access.

sections.title: 5. Liability Disclaimer
sections.content: Our services are provided "as is". We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or services, to the extent permitted by law.

sections.title: 6. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

sections.title: 7. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about these Terms, contact us at palmasrecoveryspa@gmail.com.

private.faqSubtitle: Answers about our private room experience.

faq.a: Yes. You have a single-occupancy room with private amenities and dedicated care.

faq.q: Can I have a companion stay with me?
